short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Present a popup chat window to interact with people on every tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to see a floating popup window on every page to make sure you won't miss a thing.
If you are not familiar with the product, check out https://pingmee.app
